definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)
to provide a stable crop, regardless of drought or flood/to bring a stable income

sentences.english: The ecological environment of waterlogging land in Four-lakes Region was influenced both by natural and human-caused disturbance factors.
sentences.chinese: 自然與人爲干擾共同作用於四湖地區的澇漬生態環境。

sentences.english: This paper analyzes the causation of the flood disaster according to the flood situation in the reclamation area in Heilongjiang Province.
sentences.chinese: 針對黑龍江墾區的澇漬現象，分析了澇漬產生的原因。

sentences.english: This paper analyzes the causation of the flood disaster according to the flood situation in the reclamation area in Heilongjiang Province.
sentences.chinese: 針對黑龍江墾區的澇漬現象，分析了澇漬產生的原因。

sentences.english: The only standard to reflect drought or waterlogging is soil moisture rate.
sentences.chinese: 反映旱與澇的主要指標是土壤含水率。

sentences.english: Thoughtful men ought not to be antisocial about the aridity.
sentences.chinese: 體貼的人不應該對乾澇攷慮不周。

definition: ridge between fields/row of crops/grave mound
river and county in Hebei Province
old stone or mineral, possibly related to antimony Sb 銻|锑[ti1]
